#include "mayanodes/beasttargetnode.h"

#include "liveasyncjob.h"
#include "mayacallbacks/livebeastentity.h"
#include "mayacallbacks/livebeastinstance.h"
#include "mayanodes/beastentitynode.h"
#include "mayanodes/beastinstancenode.h"
#include "mayanodes/nodeenums.h"
#include "mayanodes/nodeids.h"
#include "mayautils.h"
#include "vertextarget.h"

#include <maya/MCommandResult.h>
#include <maya/MDGModifier.h>
#include <maya/MFnNumericAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnEnumAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnMessageAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnSet.h>
#include <maya/MFnStringData.h>
#include <maya/MFnTypedAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MGlobal.h>
#include <maya/MObjectSetMessage.h>
#include <maya/MPlug.h>
#include <maya/MPlugArray.h>
#include <maya/MSelectionList.h>

namespace beastmaya {

MTypeId BeastTargetNode::id(ADSK_BEAST_TARGET);

MObject BeastTargetNode::uniqueID;
MObject BeastTargetNode::passes;
MObject BeastTargetNode::atlasTarget;
MObject BeastTargetNode::targetType;
MObject BeastTargetNode::textureResolution;
MObject BeastTargetNode::atlasPadding;
MObject BeastTargetNode::bakeUVSet;
MObject BeastTargetNode::atlasRescale;
MObject BeastTargetNode::atlasThreshold;

MObject BeastTargetNode::enableDirectFilter;
MObject BeastTargetNode::directFilterSize;
MObject BeastTargetNode::directFilterNormalDev;

MObject BeastTargetNode::enableIndirectFilter;
MObject BeastTargetNode::indirectFilterSize;
MObject BeastTargetNode::indirectFilterNormalDev;

MObject BeastTargetNode::enableOtherFilter;
MObject BeastTargetNode::otherFilterSize;
MObject BeastTargetNode::otherFilterNormalDev;

BeastTargetNode::BeastTargetNode() {
}

BeastTargetNode::~BeastTargetNode() {
}

void BeastTargetNode::postConstructor() {
        setExistWithoutInConnections(true);
        setExistWithoutOutConnections(true);

        // Create a unique ID
        MFnDependencyNode node(thisMObject());
        MString uniqueIDStr(getGuid().c_str());
        setPlugValue(node, L"uniqueID", uniqueIDStr);
}

void* BeastTargetNode::creator() {
        return new BeastTargetNode();
}

MStatus BeastTargetNode::initialize() {
        //
        //      Description:
        //              This method is called to create and initialize all of the attributes
        //      and attribute dependencies for this node type.  This is only called 
        //              once when the node type is registered with Maya.
        //
        //      Return Values:
        //              MS::kSuccess
        //              MS::kFailure
        //              

        MStatus stat;

        // Attribute types
        MFnEnumAttribute nEnumAttr;
        MFnNumericAttribute nNumAttr;
        MFnMessageAttribute nMsgAttr;
        MFnTypedAttribute  nTypedAttr;
        MFnStringData strData;

        uniqueID = nTypedAttr.create("uniqueID", "uid", MFnData::kString, strData.create(""));
        stat = addAttribute(uniqueID);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        passes = nMsgAttr.create("passes", "p");
        nMsgAttr.setArray(true);
        nMsgAttr.setReadable(false);
        nMsgAttr.setIndexMatters(false);
        stat = addAttribute(passes);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        targetType = nEnumAttr.create(L"targetType", L"tt", TARGET_TYPE_TEXTUREBAKE);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"Texture", TARGET_TYPE_TEXTUREBAKE);
        nEnumAttr.addField(L"Vertex", TARGET_TYPE_VERTEXBAKE);
        stat = addAttribute(targetType);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        atlasTarget = nNumAttr.create("atlasTarget", "at", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, true);
        stat = addAttribute(atlasTarget);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        atlasRescale = nNumAttr.create("atlasRescale", "ar", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, false);
        stat = addAttribute(atlasRescale);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        atlasThreshold = nNumAttr.create("atlasThreshold", "ath", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(atlasThreshold);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        textureResolution = nNumAttr.create("textureResolution", "tr", MFnNumericData::k2Int);
        nNumAttr.setDefault(1024, 1024);
        stat = addAttribute(textureResolution);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        atlasPadding = nNumAttr.create("atlasPadding", "ap", MFnNumericData::kInt, 0);
        nNumAttr.setMin(0);
        stat = addAttribute(atlasPadding);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        bakeUVSet = nTypedAttr.create("bakeUVSet", "buv", MFnData::kString, strData.create(""));
        stat = addAttribute(bakeUVSet);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        enableDirectFilter = nNumAttr.create("enableDirectFilter", "edf", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, false);
        stat = addAttribute(enableDirectFilter);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        directFilterSize = nNumAttr.create("directFilterSize", "dfsz", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(directFilterSize);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        directFilterNormalDev = nNumAttr.create("directFilterNormalDev", "dfn", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 25.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(directFilterNormalDev);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        enableIndirectFilter = nNumAttr.create("enableIndirectFilter", "eif", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, false);
        stat = addAttribute(enableIndirectFilter);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        indirectFilterSize = nNumAttr.create("indirectFilterSize", "ifsz", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(indirectFilterSize);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        indirectFilterNormalDev = nNumAttr.create("indirectFilterNormalDev", "ifn", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 25.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(indirectFilterNormalDev);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        enableOtherFilter = nNumAttr.create("enableOtherFilter", "eof", MFnNumericData::kBoolean, false);
        stat = addAttribute(enableOtherFilter);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        otherFilterSize = nNumAttr.create("otherFilterSize", "ofsz", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 1.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(otherFilterSize);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        otherFilterNormalDev = nNumAttr.create("otherFilterNormalDev", "ofn", MFnNumericData::kFloat, 25.0f);
        stat = addAttribute(otherFilterNormalDev);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(stat);

        return MS::kSuccess;
}

MStatus BeastTargetNode::compute( const MPlug& plug, MDataBlock& data ) {
        //
        //      Description:
        //              This method computes the value of the given output plug based
        //              on the values of the input attributes.
        //
        //      Arguments:
        //              plug - the plug to compute
        //              data - object that provides access to the attributes for this node
        //
        return MS::kSuccess;
}

bool BeastTargetNode::canBeDeleted(bool isSrcNode) {
        return false;
}

// Callback that we use to create BeastInstanceNodes and BeastEntityNodes for any mesh that is added to the set
MStatus BeastTargetNode::connectionMade( const MPlug& plug, const MPlug& otherPlug, bool asSrc ) {
        MStatus res;

        // NOTE: returning kUnknownParameter tells Maya to process the connection as usual

        // Check if we are allowed to auto-create node instances, should not be done during loading of files for instance
        MCommandResult result;
        res = MGlobal::executeCommand(L"$dummy = $gBeastAutoCreateNodes;", result);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        int autoCreateNodes = 1;
        result.getResult(autoCreateNodes);
        if(!autoCreateNodes) {
                return MS::kUnknownParameter;
        }

        // We're only interested in dag and dn set member attribute
        std::wstring plugName = getPlugName(plug);
        if(plugName != L"dagSetMembers" && plugName != L"dnSetMembers") {
                return MS::kUnknownParameter ;
        }
        MObject unknownNode = otherPlug.node();
        
        MSelectionList inputSelection;
        if(plugName == L"dagSetMembers") {
                // connected object is an instance or a group
                inputSelection.add(unknownNode);
        } else { // plugName == "dnSetMembers"
                // connected object is a set
                if(unknownNode.hasFn(MFn::kSet)) {
                        MFnSet objectSet(unknownNode);
                        objectSet.getMembers(inputSelection, true);
                }
        }
        std::vector<MObject> objs;
        getInstancesFromSelection(inputSelection, objs);
        for(auto it = begin(objs); it != end(objs); ++it) {
                res = addBeastNodes(*it);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        }
        res = MGlobal::executeCommandOnIdle(L"refreshAE;");
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        return MS::kUnknownParameter ;
}

// Callback that we use to remove BeastInstanceNodes and BeastEntityNodes for any mesh that is removed from the set
MStatus BeastTargetNode::connectionBroken( const MPlug& plug, const MPlug& otherPlug, bool asSrc ) {
        MStatus res;
        // We're only interested in dag and dn set member attribute
        std::wstring plugName = getPlugName(plug);
        if(plugName != L"dagSetMembers" && plugName != L"dnSetMembers") {
                return MS::kUnknownParameter ;
        }
        MObject unknownNode = otherPlug.node();

        MSelectionList inputSelection;
        if(plugName == L"dagSetMembers") {
                // connected object is an instance or a group
                inputSelection.add(unknownNode);
        } else { // plugName == "dnSetMembers"
                // connected object is a set
                if(unknownNode.hasFn(MFn::kSet)) {
                        MFnSet objectSet(unknownNode);
                        objectSet.getMembers(inputSelection, true);
                }
        }
        std::vector<MObject> objs;
        getInstancesFromSelection(inputSelection, objs);
        for(auto it = begin(objs); it != end(objs); ++it) {
                res = removeBeastNodes(*it);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
        }
        res = MGlobal::executeCommandOnIdle(L"refreshAE;");
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        return MS::kUnknownParameter ;
}

MStatus BeastTargetNode::addBeastNodes(const MObject& obj) {
        MStatus res;
        // We're only interested in meshes currently
        if(getNodeType(obj, false) != Mesh) {
                return MS::kSuccess;
        }
        MFnDagNode transformNode(obj);

        // Check if transform already has an instance associated with it
        MObject instance = MObject::kNullObj;
        if(isConnected(transformNode, L"beastInstance")) {
                // Dig out instance
                instance = getConnectedNode(transformNode, L"beastInstance").first;
        } else {
                // Create instance
                MDGModifier dgm;
                MObject instanceObj = dgm.createNode(BeastInstanceNode::id, &res);
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

                res = dgm.doIt();
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

                //  Connect the instance to the transform
                res = connect(instanceObj, L"instance", transformNode, L"beastInstance");
                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);
                instance = instanceObj;
        }

        // Get this targets ID
        MString targetUniqueID;
        getPlugValue(thisMObject(), L"uniqueID", targetUniqueID);

        // Check if there's already a Beast entity connected to the Beast instance
        std::vector<std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> > connectedNodes;
        MPlug entitiesPlug = transformNode.findPlug(L"beastEntities", true);
        getConnectedNodes(entitiesPlug, connectedNodes);

        for(auto it = begin(connectedNodes); it != end(connectedNodes); ++it) {
                MFnDependencyNode entityObj((*it).first);

                if(entityObj.typeId() != ADSK_BEAST_ENTITY) {
                        // This could probably also be worth an assert, but since Maya allows you to connect whatever...
                        continue;
                }

                MString entityTargetID;
                getPlugValue(entityObj, L"target", entityTargetID);
                if(entityTargetID == targetUniqueID) {
                        // Already has an entity for this target, all done.
                        return MS::kSuccess;
                }
        }

        // Create a new BeastEntity
        MDGModifier dgm;
        MObject entityObj = dgm.createNode(BeastEntityNode::id, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        res = dgm.doIt();
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        //  Connect the entity to the transform
        res = connect(entityObj, L"instance", transformNode, L"beastEntities");
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        // Connect the entity to the target
        // TODO: better error handling
        setPlugValue(entityObj, L"target", targetUniqueID);

        // Create a callback if running live
        LiveAsyncJobPtr liveJob = LiveAsyncJob::getInstance();
        if(liveJob) {
                JobContext& bjc = liveJob->getJobContext();
                auto it = bjc.getRenderGraph().entities.find(obj);
                if(it == end(bjc.getRenderGraph().entities)) {
                        // This object has not been baked, we have to create a new BeastTargetEntity
                        // It does not matter which type of entity we create since the type can be changed live
                        VertexEntityPtr newEntity(new VertexEntity(obj, entityObj));
                        BeastInstancePtr beastInstance = bjc.getSceneManager().getInstance(obj);
                        newEntity->setBeastInstance(beastInstance);
                        auto targetIt = bjc.getRenderGraph().targets.find(thisMObject());
                        // We do not support creating completely new targets live, so better watch that the target is actually exported
                        if(targetIt  != end(bjc.getRenderGraph().targets)) {
                                TargetPtr aTarget = targetIt->second;
                                newEntity->exportEntity(aTarget->getBeastTarget());
                                bjc.getRenderGraph().entities.insert(std::make_pair(obj, newEntity));
                                it = bjc.getRenderGraph().entities.find(obj);
                                // Create a BeastInstanceNode callback
                                bjc.insertLiveCallback(obj, NodeMessageObjectPtr(new LiveBeastInstance(instance, newEntity->getBeastTargetEntity())));
                        }                       
                }
                if(it != end(bjc.getRenderGraph().entities)) {
                        // Insert new callback
                        BeastTargetEntityPtr& targetEntity = it->second->getBeastTargetEntity();
                        if(!targetEntity) {
                                // This is a serious plug-in error
                                CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(MS::kFailure);
                        }
                        bjc.insertLiveCallback(obj, NodeMessageObjectPtr(new LiveBeastEntity(entityObj, targetEntity)));
                        // Tell existing entity to switch to our bake type if this is the default/active entity
                        MObject defaultEntity = getLiveEntityNode(transformNode);
                        if(entityObj == defaultEntity) {
                                MObject defaultTarget = getLiveBeastTarget(transformNode);
                                if(defaultTarget == MObject::kNullObj) {
                                        return MS::kFailure;
                                }
                                int defaultTargetType = 0;
                                getPlugValue(defaultTarget, L"targetType", defaultTargetType);
                                ILBTargetEntityType tt = defaultTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_TEXTUREBAKE ? ILB_TT_TEXTURE : ILB_TT_VERTEX;
                                targetEntity->changeTargetEntityType(tt);
                                if(defaultTargetType == TARGET_TYPE_TEXTUREBAKE) {
                                        int2 textureResolution = {512, 512};
                                        getLiveTextureResolution(transformNode, textureResolution);
                                        targetEntity->setBakeResolution(textureResolution[0], textureResolution[1]);
                                }
                        }
                }
        }

        return MS::kSuccess;
}

MStatus BeastTargetNode::removeBeastNodes(const MObject& obj) {
        MStatus res;
        // We're only interested in meshes currently
        if(getNodeType(obj, false) != Mesh) {
                return MS::kSuccess;
        }
        MFnDagNode transformNode(obj, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

        // Get this targets ID
        MString targetUniqueID;
        getPlugValue(thisMObject(), L"uniqueID", targetUniqueID);

        MObject defaultEntity = getLiveEntityNode(transformNode);
        if(defaultEntity == MObject::kNullObj) {
                return MS::kSuccess;
        }

        // Check if there's already a Beast entity connected to the Beast instance
        std::vector<std::pair<MObject, std::wstring> > connectedNodes;
        MPlug entitiesPlug = transformNode.findPlug(L"beastEntities", true);
        getConnectedNodes(entitiesPlug, connectedNodes);
        for(auto it = begin(connectedNodes); it != end(connectedNodes); ++it) {
                MFnDependencyNode entityObj((*it).first);

                if(entityObj.typeId() != ADSK_BEAST_ENTITY) {
                        // This could probably also be worth an assert, but since Maya allows you to connect whatever...
                        continue;
                }

                MString entityTargetID;
                getPlugValue(entityObj, L"target", entityTargetID);
                if(entityTargetID == targetUniqueID) {
                        bool deletingDefaultEntity = defaultEntity == entityObj.object();

                        MDGModifier dgm;
                        res = dgm.deleteNode(entityObj.object());
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

                        res = dgm.doIt();
                        CHECK_MSTATUS_AND_RETURN_IT(res);

                        if(deletingDefaultEntity) {
                                // We have to switch active entity when running Live
                                LiveAsyncJobPtr liveJob = LiveAsyncJob::getInstance();
                                if(liveJob) {
                                        JobContext& bjc = liveJob->getJobContext();
                                        auto it = bjc.getRenderGraph().entities.find(obj);
                                        if(it != end(bjc.getRenderGraph().entities)) {
                                                MObject defaultTarget = getLiveBeastTarget(transformNode);
                                                if(defaultTarget == MObject::kNullObj) {
                                                        // WILD HACK, set texture resolution to 0 x 0 to disable baking
                                                        it->second->getBeastTargetEntity()->changeTargetEntityType(ILB_TT_TEXTURE);
                                                        it->second->getBeastTargetEntity()->setBakeResolution(0, 0);
                                                        return MS::kSuccess;
                                                }
                                                // Update bake type and texture resolution
                                                int targetType = 0;
                                                getPlugValue(defaultTarget, L"targetType", targetType);
                                                ILBTargetEntityType tt = targetType == TARGET_TYPE_TEXTUREBAKE ? ILB_TT_TEXTURE : ILB_TT_VERTEX;
                                                it->second->getBeastTargetEntity()->changeTargetEntityType(tt);
                                                if(targetType == TARGET_TYPE_TEXTUREBAKE) {
                                                        int2 textureResolution = {512, 512};
                                                        getLiveTextureResolution(transformNode, textureResolution);
                                                        it->second->getBeastTargetEntity()->setBakeResolution(textureResolution[0], textureResolution[1]);
                                                }
                                        }
                                }
                        }
                        return MS::kSuccess;
                }
        }
        return MS::kSuccess;
}

}
